sqlQuery.name: MetabolicPathwayReactions
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT pa.SOURCE_ID , pa.PATHWAY_SOURCE , pr.REACTION_SOURCE_ID , pr.REACTION_URL , pr.ENZYME , pr.ENZYME_DESCRIPTION , pr.EXPASY_URL , pr.EXPASY_HTML , pr.EQUATION_HTML as equation , CASE pr.IS_REVERSIBLE WHEN '1' THEN 'Y' WHEN '0' THEN 'N' END as reversible , pr.SUBSTRATES_TEXT , pr.PRODUCTS_TEXT , CASE WHEN pr.ENZYME = '-.-.-.-' THEN 'N/A' ELSE CONCAT('', gc.GENE_COUNT, '') END AS GENE_COUNT FROM webready.PathwayAttributes pa , webready.PathwayCompounds pc , webready.PathwayReactions pr , webready.PathwayNodes pn , (select pathway_source_id, count(gene_source_id) as gene_count from apidbtuning.PathwayGenesThin group by pathway_source_id) as gc WHERE pc.pathway_id = pa.PATHWAY_ID AND pn.SOURCE_ID = pa.SOURCE_ID AND pr.REACTION_ID = pc.REACTION_ID AND pr.EXT_DB_NAME = pc.EXT_DB_NAME AND pr.ENZYME = pn.DISPLAY_LABEL AND gc.pathway_source_id = pa.source_id ORDER BY pr.ENZYME

sqlQuery.name: PathwayReactionsXrefs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT tbl.* FROM ( WITH pathway_reaction AS ( SELECT DISTINCT pathway_id , pathway_reaction_id FROM apidb.pathwayreactionrel ) , pathway_counts AS ( SELECT pathway_id, count(*) AS ct FROM pathway_reaction GROUP BY pathway_id ) SELECT pa1.source_id , pa1.pathway_source , pa2.pathway_source AS alt_pathway_source , pa2.source_id AS alt_pathway_source_id , pa2.name , pc1.ct AS reaction_count , pc2.ct AS alt_reaction_count , CASE WHEN pc1.ct < pc2.ct THEN count(*) / pc1.ct ELSE count(*) / pc2.ct END * 100 AS pct , count(*) AS overlap_count FROM webready.PathwayAttributes pa1 , webready.PathwayAttributes pa2 , pathway_reaction ap , pathway_counts pc1 , pathway_counts pc2 , ( SELECT DISTINCT pr.pathway_id , prx.associated_reaction_id AS pathway_reaction_id FROM pathway_reaction pr , apidb.pathwayreactionxref prx WHERE prx.pathway_reaction_id = pr.pathway_reaction_id UNION SELECT DISTINCT pr.pathway_id , pr.pathway_reaction_id FROM pathway_reaction pr ) ax WHERE ap.pathway_reaction_id = ax.pathway_reaction_id AND pa1.pathway_id = ap.pathway_id AND pa2.pathway_id = ax.pathway_id AND pa1.pathway_id = pc1.pathway_id AND pa2.pathway_id = pc2.pathway_id AND pa1.pathway_id != pa2.pathway_id GROUP BY pa1.source_id , pa1.pathway_source , pa2.source_id , pa2.pathway_source , pa2.name , pc1.ct , pc2.ct HAVING count(*) > 1 ) tbl ORDER BY tbl.pct DESC

sqlQuery.name: PathwayGraphs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pa.source_id , pa.pathway_source , g.display_name , CONCAT(g.internal, '&template=', CASE g.is_graph_custom WHEN 'true' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS internal , g.xaxis_description FROM webready.PathwayAttributes pa , ( SELECT '*** Default ***' AS display_name, '' AS internal, '' AS is_graph_custom, '' AS xaxis_description -- TEMPLATE_ANCHOR pathwayGraphs ) g WHERE ('@PROJECT_ID@' = 'UniDB' OR g.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@') AND NOT g.internal LIKE '%MassSpec%'

sqlQuery.name: PathwayNodes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT NULL as image , pn.* FROM webready.PathwayNodes pn
